original_text: The southern side began at the outskirts of Kiriath Jearim on the west, and the boundary came out at the spring of the waters of Nephtoah.
korean_text: 남쪽 경계는 기럇 여아림 끝에서부터 서쪽으로 나아가 넵도아 물 근원에 이르고

sentences.original_text: The southern side began at the outskirts of Kiriath Jearim on the west
sentences.korean_translation: 남쪽 경계는 서쪽의 기럇야림 교외에서 시작했으며

sentences.original_text: at the spring of the waters
